svg.text: FIGURE 2: QUANTUM ALGORITHM TIMING ANALYSIS AND FRAGMENT EXPIRATION OPTIMIZATION

g.text: • Monitoring Resource Usage: 0.01% CPU per 1000 fragments (minimal impact)
• Memory Overhead: 2KB per fragment metadata (acceptable for enterprise deployment)
• Network Impact: No additional network overhead
• Storage Requirements: +15% for metadata (justified by security gain)
• Scalability: Linear scaling up to 1M concurrent fragments
